channel.title: Rather funny
channel.description:
I really did not know where to put this... So mods you can fuck it up however you want if you have to..
Anywyas, all I asked for on the server development\help forum was how to make an item have a "Buy X" option.. Anyways, Dr. Dre said he could do it for a price.. Anyways it turned into this: I would give him my woodcutter/mage account for a full working castlewars script and a "how to" on making a no-ip thing work. Yes, I am desperate. Well anyways, I gave him the password and he went on, he asked about recovery questions and all that and basically I said okay now can you help me with that stuff, only to find that about 3 minutes later he replied with "done with ur account" and logged off MSN. Now keep in mind that I have not played RS for about 8 months now and I had ABSOLUTELY NOTHING of value on the account.. Except the stats of course. So I log into my account and this is what I see...
[img]http://img301.imageshack.us/my.php?image=omgsz1.png[/img] http://img301.imageshack.us/my.php?image=omgsz1.png
The only reason I trusted him is because he is a senior member here and had good tutorials so I knew he was a good coder... I have nothing on the account now and don't really care because he only took what was in it which was all about 60k worth. I am still looking for help on castlewars and no-ip... If anyone would like to help it would be very much appreciated. I am not a noob at all, even though I only know very basic coding, I know how to fix most compile errors, make commands, and all that stuff. I know very well how to use the search button, and follow tutorials... Once again if anyone would like to help.. All I need is to find out how to make a WORKING parseincomingpackets2(); and how to get a no-ip thing working... add me on MSN if you want.. l3remner@hotmail.com
Anyone who read this whole post, thank you, anyone who didn't read is and is proceeding to flame me, don't... Because I really don't care...

just get hide-ip thing in the d/l tutorial…it works good.

item.title: Rather funny
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

[quote=“arraness14, post:9, topic:8649”][quote author=Aftermath.v2 link=topic=12262.msg137640#msg137640 date=1155085517]
I didn’t cheat, White Castle just repped me way too much, and my policy is the I return every re I get.
[/quote]

thats what they all say…
lol hahahahahah i just got that…omg read your post again…its like a child explaining why they shot the dog “he barked at me so I shot him” dude you “I am a spamming noob who doesnt read the rules” if they did something you like ON THAT POST. its not give me 2 gp and I will “I am a spamming noob who doesnt read the rules” you…or I “I am a spamming noob who doesnt read the rules” you you “I am a spamming noob who doesnt read the rules” me.[/quote]

Wtf are you talking about?

Read full topic

thats what they all say…
lol hahahahahah i just got that…omg read your post again…its like a child explaining why they shot the dog “he barked at me so I shot him” dude you rep if they did something you like ON THAT POST. its not give me 2 gp and I will rep you…or I rep you you rep me.
